description: JERUSALEM DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME IS TO DEVELOPE THE CAPACITY OF JERUSALEM CIVIL SOCIETY ORGANIZATIONS, REHABILITATION OF HOUSES, ECONOMIC EMPOWERMENT, LAND PROTECTION, & SUPPORT TO SMALL BUSINESSES AND ENTERPRISES

subproject.description: ECONOMIC EMPOWERMENT OF DEPRIVED FAMILIES IN JERUSALEM THROUGH PROVIDING MICRO ENTERPRISES TO REACH 300 DEPRIVED FAMILIES THROUGH BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT GRANTS TO ESTABLISH INCOME GENERATING PROJECTS TO GRADUATE FAMILIES FROM POVERTY
subproject.title: ECONOMIC EMPOWERMENT JERUSALEM

subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: LAND DEVELOPMENT JERUSALEM

subproject.description:
1 Sustainable CSOs engagement in East Jerusalem under the umbrella of a solid pilot Programme in the city enhanced
2. The capacities of the CSOs in EJ as knowledge providers and active strategizing agents developed.
3. Synergies and  dialogues among CSOs and other stakeholders established.
subproject.title: CIVIL SOCIETY ORG JERUSALEM

subproject.description: Enhanced access to effective social, economic and public services and utilities in East Jerusalem
subproject.title: HOUSE REHABILITATION JERUSALEM

subproject.description: DEVELOP & SUPPORT AROUND 150 SMALL ENTERPRISES IN  JERUSALEM THROUGH GRANTS & MICROFINANCE and including around 300 families in these small enterprises.
subproject.title: SMALL ENTERPRISES JERUSALEM

title: JERUSALEM DEVELOPMENT - ISLAMIC DEVELOPMENT BANK
